User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the GamerVerse platform.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

isAdmin.description: Indicates if the user has admin privileges.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. User ID is the Firebase Auth UID. Includes denormalized 'uid' in the document for simpler security rules.

/games/{gameId}.description: Stores game information. Publicly readable, but only writable by admins.

/users/{userId}/carts/{cartId}.description: Stores user's cart information. Accessible only by the user.

/users/{userId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores order information for each user. Accessible only by the user and admins.

/roles_admin/{userId}.description: Indicates if a user has admin privileges. Existence of a document grants admin access.

/payment_qr/current.description: Stores the current payment QR code.  Writable only by admins. Single document collection.
